title: Systems Design & Automation Engineer
location: Jersey City, NJ / Tampa, FL / Coppell, TX (Hybrid)
description: Design, build, and operate an automation-first platform leveraging RHEL, Ansible Automation Platform, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and AWS for a large professional services firm. Enable self-service for application teams through secure, scalable, and observable platform capabilities.
htmlDescription:
About the Role

Our client, a large professional services firm, is looking to hire a Systems Design & Automation Engineer for a 6-month hybrid contract. The consultant must be commutable from one of three locations and will be spending 2-3 days onsite: Jersey City, NJ; Tampa, FL; or Coppell, TX.

Responsibilities

  • Design, build, and operate an automation-first platform leveraging RHEL, Ansible Automation Platform, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and AWS
  • Enable self-service for application teams through secure, scalable, and observable platform capabilities
  • Automate platform operations using Ansible (Core & Automation Platform)
  • Design and maintain Infrastructure as Code for AWS resources with Terraform
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines for infrastructure and configuration
  • Standardize RHEL lifecycle management (build, harden, patch)
  • Develop and document architecture/design standards and best practices for the Linux environment
  • Create secure patterns for identity, access, and secrets management
  • Build self-service experiences including catalog items and reference architectures

Required Skills

  • 5+ years Linux administration (RHEL expertise)
  • 3+ years AWS at scale; multi-account governance
  • Hands-on experience with Ansible and Terraform
  • Strong scripting skills in Bash/Python
  • CI/CD pipeline experience
  • Knowledge of security/compliance and cloud networking fundamentals
  • Experience with production operations and incident management

Desired Skills

  • Red Hat/AWS certifications
  • Kubernetes/EKS or OpenShift experience
  • Policy-as-Code experience
  • Image pipeline development
  • Cost optimization exposure
requirements: 5+ years Linux administration with RHEL expertise
3+ years AWS at scale with multi-account governance
Hands-on experience with Ansible and Terraform
Knowledge of security/compliance and cloud networking fundamentals
Experience with production operations and incident management
qualifications: Design, build, and operate automation-first platform leveraging RHEL, Ansible, IaC, and AWS
Enable self-service for application teams through secure, scalable, and observable platform capabilities
Automate platform operations using Ansible (Core & Automation Platform)
Design and maintain Infrastructure as Code for AWS resources with Terraform
Implement CI/CD pipelines for infrastructure and configuration
Standardize RHEL lifecycle management (build, harden, patch)
Develop and document architecture/design standards and best practices
Create secure patterns for identity, access, and secrets management
Build self-service experiences including catalog items and reference architectures
experience: 5+ years Linux administration, 3+ years AWS at scale

title: Senior Full Stack Lead Developer - Angular/Node
description: Senior Full Stack developer who can lead the team and help developers offer solutions. Designing architecture, providing solutions, and supporting customer online accounts and upgrading online accounts. Strong experience with Angular and Node.js required, with preference for candidates from Vendor Payment, Auto Payment, or transactional experience companies.
htmlDescription:
About the Role

We are seeking a Senior Full Stack developer who can lead the team and help developers offer solutions. This role involves designing architecture, providing solutions, and supporting customer online accounts and upgrading online accounts.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead development team and provide technical guidance
  • Design system architecture and provide technical solutions
  • Support customer online accounts and account upgrades
  • Mentor developers and offer technical solutions
  • Work with Angular and Node.js technology stack
  • Collaborate on payment and transactional systems

Required Skills

  • Senior-level experience in Full Stack development
  • Strong leadership and mentoring capabilities
  • Extensive experience with Angular framework
  • Proficient in Node.js development
  • Experience with online account systems
  • Architecture design experience

Preferred Experience

  • Background from Vendor Payment companies
  • Auto Payment systems experience
  • Transactional systems experience
  • Team leadership experience
  • Customer-facing application development
requirements: Senior-level experience in Full Stack development
qualifications: Lead development team and provide technical guidance
Design system architecture and provide technical solutions
Support customer online accounts and account upgrades
Mentor developers and offer technical solutions
Work with Angular and Node.js technology stack
Collaborate on payment and transactional systems
experience: Senior-level Full Stack development with leadership experience

title: Full Stack Developer - Angular 17+ Upgrade Specialist
description: Full Stack developer with heavy experience in Angular and Node.js. This developer will upgrade the Angular platform to version 17, requiring experience with Angular 17 or above. Focus on platform upgrades, security updates, and modern Angular development practices.
htmlDescription:
About the Role

We need a Full Stack developer with heavy experience in Angular and Node.js. This developer will be responsible for upgrading the Angular platform to version 17 and should have hands-on experience with Angular 17 or above.

Key Responsibilities

  • Upgrade Angular platform to version 17 or above
  • Implement security updates and modern practices
  • Platform modernization and optimization
  • Work with Node.js backend systems
  • Ensure compatibility and performance during upgrades
  • Implement best practices for Angular 17+

Required Skills

  • Heavy experience with Angular framework
  • Experience with Angular 17 or above versions
  • Strong Node.js development skills
  • Platform upgrade experience
  • Security update implementation
  • Modern Angular development practices

Technical Focus

  • Angular 17+ migration and upgrade
  • Security updates and patches
  • Platform optimization
  • Code modernization
  • Performance improvements
requirements: Experience with Angular 17 or above versions
qualifications: Upgrade Angular platform to version 17 or above
Implement security updates and modern practices
Platform modernization and optimization
Work with Node.js backend systems
Ensure compatibility and performance during upgrades
Implement best practices for Angular 17+
experience: Heavy Angular experience with Angular 17+ upgrade expertise
